home.title: MathLearn
home.subtitle: Learn Math Through Fun Games!
home.description: Join thousands of kids learning math with our colorful, animated games. Race against time, pop balloons, solve puzzles, and earn XP!

games.title: Choose Your Game!
games.subtitle: Pick a game and start learning math in a fun way!

login.title: Welcome Back!

badges.title: Badges
badges.subtitle: Discover all badges and learn how to earn them!
badges.infoDescription: Badges represent your achievements in math games. Each badge rewards a different accomplishment!
badges.infoPoint1: Badges are earned automatically while playing games
badges.infoPoint2: Your earned badges are displayed on your profile page
badges.infoPoint3: You can see badge details by clicking or touching the 'i' icon on badges

quickRace.name: Quick Race
quickRace.description: Race against time! Answer as many math questions as you can in 60 seconds!
quickRace.title: ‚ö° Quick Math Race ‚ö°
quickRace.startInstructions: Answer as many math questions as you can in 60 seconds!

balloonPop.name: Balloon Pop
balloonPop.description: Pop the balloons with correct answers! Find all the right calculations!
balloonPop.title: üéà Balloon Pop Math üéà
balloonPop.instructions: Pop all {count} balloons with correct answers!

adventure.name: Adventure
adventure.description: Explore levels and complete math challenges to unlock new adventures!
adventure.title: üó∫Ô∏è Math Adventure Map üó∫Ô∏è
adventure.mapDescription: Complete levels to unlock new adventures! Each level has math challenges waiting for you.
adventure.startInstructions: Answer as many math questions as you can in 60 seconds!

fractions.name: Fractions
fractions.description: Build fractions by selecting blocks! Learn fractions in a fun way!
fractions.title: üß© Fraction Builder üß©
fractions.instructions: Select a block, then select a slot to place {numerator} filled blocks into {denominator} slots!
fractions.selectedBlock: Block selected! Now select a slot.

geometry.name: Geometry
geometry.description: Match shapes to their properties! Learn geometry through selection!
geometry.title: üî∑ Geometry Match üî∑
geometry.instructions: Select a shape, then select its correct description!

wordStories.name: Word Stories
wordStories.description: Read fun stories and solve math word problems!
wordStories.title: Word Problem Stories

subtraction.storyTemplate: {name} has {a} {item} and gives {b} to {friend}. How many {item} does {name} have left?

addition.storyTemplate: {name} has {a} {item}. {action} {b} more {item}. How many {item} does {name} have now?

division.storyTemplate: {name} has {a} {item}. {action} them equally with {b} {people}. How many {item} does each person get?
division.questionTemplate: How many {item} does each person get?

multiplication.storyTemplate: {name} has {a} {container}. Each {containerSingular} has {b} {item}. How many {item} does {name} have in total?
multiplication.questionTemplate: How many {item} does {name} have in total?

subtractionCount.storyTemplate: There are {a} {item} {location}. {b} {item} {action}. How many {item} are left?

errors.emailSendFailed: Failed to send email. Please check SMTP configuration.
